thread.title: MARIO SEQUEIRA
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by MARIO SEQUEIRA

author: MARIO SEQUEIRA
title: MARIO SEQUEIRA
text: I FOUND THAT MY EXPERIENCE WAS ABOVE SATISFACTION. I SET UP AN APPOINTMENT AND WAS ATTENDED PROMPTLY. THE STAFF WAS VERY COURTEOUS AND MY WAIT TIME WAS VERY ACCOMMODATING TO MY SCHEDULE. THEY ASK THAT I RETURN AFTER 25 MILES OF DRIVE TIME TO CHECK ON THERE WORK, THAT IN TURN GAVE ME PEACE OF MIND FOR MY SAFETY AND THERE DEDICATION FOR A JOB WELL DONE. WITH OUT ANY DOUBT I RECOMMEND THEIR SERVICES AND PROFESSIONALISM. THANK YOU.
